snippet: Mitt Romney has pledged to cut individual income tax rates for everyone, but he has provided few specifics, confounding analysts and leaving himself open to attack from Democrats.
abstract: Washington Memo; Mitt Romney has pledged to cut individual income tax rates for everyone, and to do it without increasing the federal budget deficit or putting new tax burdens on middle-income people to make up for the lost revenues; candidate has provided no further specifics of plan, confounding analysts and leaving himself open to attack from Democrats.

byline.original: By ANNIE LOWREY and DAVID KOCIENIEWSKI

lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney has pledged to cut individual income tax rates for everyone, but he has provided few specifics, confounding analysts and leaving himself open to attack from Democrats.

headline.seo: Romney’s Tax Plan Leaves Key Variables Blank - Washington Memo
headline.main: Romney’s Tax Plan Leaves Key Variables Blank
headline.print_headline: Effects of Romney’s Tax Plan? Key Variables Are Left Blank
